channel.title: RigidScape ­­­­| NEW 753 ­| NEW AGED RSPS ­­­­| Updated frequently!
channel.description:
Hello, RigidScape is a server created by my friend, along with a couple of his buddies. It's brand new, just released off of BETA. It's had 12 long months in beta being developed to guarantee absolute player satisfaction. It's 753, there's a new feature coming shortly so you can change which revision you play on. ( for those who like the old school look. ) It has every item you can think of plus some custom items, which you can see on forum or ingame. There's custom bosses, and there's 2 that are going to be released within a few days. There's a couple custom quest, a new player feature that's literally NEVER been seen before coming in the next batch update. You'll get more info on the website soon. Players are gonna LOVE this new feature to the max. There's so much more, I can't even type it all. Please come check us out, you won't regret it.
www.rigidscape.com
